channel.title: machine-learning on Agustí Alentorn
channel.description: Recent content in machine-learning on Agustí Alentorn

item.title: PRT-K
item.description: This project is funded by the Institut National du Cancer INCa and the DGOS and aim to model mathematically the evolution of Primary Central Nervous System Lymphoma (PCNSL). It is a partnership between different teams: AP-HP, Pr HOANG-XUAN and Dr ALENTORN CEA-Neurospin Dr FROUIN INRIA from Paris, Dr DRASDO INRIA from Bordeaux, Dr SAUT and Institut Curie, Dr SOUSSAIN It will combine radiomics data, NGS, and microscopic data from data to model and microscopic and mesoscale the evolution of PCNSL.

item.title: CIT
item.description: This project is funded by the La Ligue Nationale Contre le Cancer - Carte d’Idendité de Tumeurs, CIT This project is leaded by Dr ALENTORN and aims to analyze PCNSL using multi-comics NGS data: Whole-exome RNA-seq Methylation Radiomics We will use a large cohort of PCNSL to underpin new potential therapeutic targets in this orphan disease.
